title: SUNDAY Hotel to open 25 premium hotels in India in by March 2025
description: SUNDAY Hotels, a premium brand of hotels was originally launched in May 2023 through a joint venture between the Softbank Group and Oravel Stays, the parent company of Oyo. The first SUNDAY hotel was launched in Jaipur followed by Vadodara and Chandigarh.
